alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Palm Beach County through 415 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Loxahatchee NWR to 6 miles north of Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Canal Point, Royal Palm Beach, Okeelanta, Loxahatchee NWR, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Belle Glade Camp, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, Fremd Village-Padgett Island and The Acreage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
